title.narrative: IMPREST Account and Consultancy - Enabling State Programme

description.narrative: This activity (IMPREST Account and Consultancy - Enabling State Programme) is a component of Enabling State Programme reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £17,938,472. This component benefits Nepal, and works in the following sector(s): Public sector policy and administrative management. , with the following implementing partners: Asia Foundation, The, Options Consultancy Services, Palladium International Ltd (UK), The Asia Foundation, WYG International. The start date is 01-08-1997 and the end date is 31-01-2014.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA

sector.narrative: Public sector policy and administrative management
